commentBody: I suppose that this little bit of passive aggressive fluff is the best that Rhoden can do to offer a mea culpa for all of the venomous claptrap that he has written about the Pats. I always assumed that air pressure measurement is not so technical and recondite that someone writing for the NYT could not understand it. But maybe that's not true after all, and Rhoden had his eureka moment when he noticed that his tire pressure decreased in the cold weather. Better late than never, as they say.
